Package xyz.morphia.mapping

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MorphiaInstanceCreator<T>
    Defines a Morphia-specific InstanceCreator
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultCreator
    Factory class for creating various types.
    InstanceCreatorFactoryImpl<T>
    Morphia's implementation of InstanceCreatorFactory
    MappedClass
    Represents a mapped class between the MongoDB document and the java POJO.
    MappedField
    Represents the mapping of this field to/from mongodb (name, list)
    Mapper
    This is the heart of Morphia and takes care of mapping from/to POJOs/Documents.
    MapperOptions
    Options to control mapping behavior.
    MorphiaConvention
    Defines a Convention to apply
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MappingException
    Indicates an error during mapping
